Post.title: Debian 7.5 Initialize
Post._content:
### Initialize

#### Add User

	# addgroup admin
	# useradd -d /home/cauchy -s /bin/bash -m cauchy
	# passwd cauchy
	# usermod -a -G admin cauchy
	# visudo

#### Find This Line

	root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL 
	after it add the following line
	root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL cauchy ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL 

#### Login as cauchy

	$ sudo vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config

#### Modify Following Content

	Protocol 2

	PermitRootLogin no
	PermitEmptyPasswords no
	PasswordAuthentication no

	RSAAuthentication yes
	PubkeyAuthentication yes
	AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys

	UseDNS no
	AllowUsers cauchy


#### Pubkey Login

	$ ssh -p12312 cauchy@cauchy.me 'mkdir -p .ssh && cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys' < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

#### Login to cauchy.me again

	$ sudo chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys && chmod 700 ~/.ssh/

#### timezone setup

	$ tzselect
	$ echo "TZ='Asia/Shanghai'; export TZ" >> ~/.profile
	$ . ~/.profile
	$ sudo apt-get update
	$ sudo apt-get upgrade

### Install Dropbox
	$ cd ~ && wget -O - "https://www.dropbox.com/download?plat=lnx.x86_64" | tar xzf -
	$ mkdir -p ~/bin && wget -O ~/bin/dropbox.py "https://www.dropbox.com/download?dl=packages/dropbox.py"

### Install nginx

#### From Repositories

	$ sudo apt-get update
	$ sudo apt-get upgrade
	$ sudo apt-get install nginx

#### From Source Distribution

	$ sudo apt-get update
	$ sudo apt-get upgrade
	$ sudo apt-get install libpcre3-dev build-essential libssl-dev
	$ cd /opt/
	$ sudo wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.5.9.tar.gz
	$ sudo tar -zxvf nginx-1.5.9.tar.gz
	$ cd /opt/nginx-1.5.9/
	$ sudo ./configure --prefix=/opt/nginx --user=nginx --group=nginx --with-http_ssl_module --with-ipv6

##### You should see:

	nginx path prefix: "/opt/nginx"
	nginx binary file: "/opt/nginx/sbin/nginx"
	nginx configuration prefix: "/opt/nginx/conf"
	nginx configuration file: "/opt/nginx/conf/nginx.conf"
	nginx pid file: "/opt/nginx/logs/nginx.pid"
	nginx error log file: "/opt/nginx/logs/error.log"
	nginx http access log file: "/opt/nginx/logs/access.log"
	nginx http client request body temporary files: "client_body_temp"
	nginx http proxy temporary files: "proxy_temp"
	nginx http fastcgi temporary files: "fastcgi_temp"
	nginx http uwsgi temporary files: "uwsgi_temp"
	nginx http scgi temporary files: "scgi_temp"

##### Then

	$ sudo make
	$ sudo make install
	$ sudo adduser --system --no-create-home --disabled-login --disabled-password --group nginx

#### Create an Init Script to Manage Nginx

	$ sudo wget -O init-deb.sh http://library.linode.com/assets/1538-init-deb.sh
	$ sudo mv init-deb.sh /etc/init.d/nginx
	$ sudo chmod +x /etc/init.d/nginx
	$ sudo /usr/sbin/update-rc.d -f nginx defaults

#### Edit /etc/init.d/nginx

	DAEMON=/usr/sbin/nginx

#### Edit /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

	user cauchy;

#### Start nginx 

	$ sudo service nginx start

#### Add www folder

	$ sudo mkdir /var/www
	$ sudo chown cauchy:cauchy /var/www

#### Add Virtual Host, edit /etc/nginx/conf.d/vhosts.conf

	server {
	    listen 80;
	    server_name cauchy.com;
	    index index.html;
	    root /var/www/cauchycai.github.io;
	}

### Install jekyll

#### install gem 

#### install jekyll

	$ sudo gem install jekyll

### github config

#### Install git client

	$ sudo apt-get install git
	$ git config --global user.email "yourname@example.com"
	$ git config --global user.name "Your Name"

#### Make sure .ssh/id_rsa.pub does not exist

	$ cd ~/.ssh
	$ ls -al

#### Generate a new SSH key

	$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "yourname@example.com"

#### Copy .ssh/id_rsa.pub to github and test

	$ ssh -T git@github.com

title: "Debian 7.5 Initialize"
date: 2014-06-10 00:00:00
tags: [om, linux]
---


### Initialize

#### Add User

	# addgroup admin
	# useradd -d /home/cauchy -s /bin/bash -m cauchy
	# passwd cauchy
	# usermod -a -G admin cauchy
	# visudo

#### Find This Line

	root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL 
	after it add the following line
	root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL cauchy ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL 

#### Login as cauchy

	$ sudo vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config

#### Modify Following Content

	Protocol 2

	PermitRootLogin no
	PermitEmptyPasswords no
	PasswordAuthentication no

	RSAAuthentication yes
	PubkeyAuthentication yes
	AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys

	UseDNS no
	AllowUsers cauchy


#### Pubkey Login

	$ ssh -p12312 cauchy@cauchy.me 'mkdir -p .ssh && cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys' < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

#### Login to cauchy.me again

#### Edit /etc/init.d/nginx

	DAEMON=/usr/sbin/nginx

#### Edit /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

	user cauchy;

#### Start nginx 

	$ sudo service nginx start

#### Add www folder

	$ sudo mkdir /var/www
	$ sudo chown cauchy:cauchy /var/www

#### Add Virtual Host, edit /etc/nginx/conf.d/vhosts.conf

	server {
	    listen 80;
	    server_name cauchy.com;
	    index index.html;
	    root /var/www/cauchycai.github.io;
	}

### Install jekyll

#### install gem 

#### install jekyll

	$ sudo gem install jekyll

### github config

#### Install git client

	$ sudo apt-get install git
	$ git config --global user.email "yourname@example.com"
	$ git config --global user.name "Your Name"

#### Make sure .ssh/id_rsa.pub does not exist

#### Generate a new SSH key

	$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "yourname@example.com"

#### Copy .ssh/id_rsa.pub to github and test

	$ ssh -T git@github.com

Initialize

Add User

# addgroup admin
# useradd -d /home/cauchy -s /bin/bash -m cauchy
# passwd cauchy
# usermod -a -G admin cauchy
# visudo

Find This Line

root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL 
after it add the following line
root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL cauchy ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL

Login as cauchy

$ sudo vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config

Modify Following Content

Protocol 2

PermitRootLogin no
PermitEmptyPasswords no
PasswordAuthentication no

RSAAuthentication yes
PubkeyAuthentication yes
AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys

UseDNS no
AllowUsers cauchy

Pubkey Login

$ ssh -p12312 cauchy@cauchy.me 'mkdir -p .ssh && cat >> .ssh/authorized_keys' < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

Login to cauchy.me again

$ sudo chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys && chmod 700 ~/.ssh/

timezone setup

$ tzselect
$ echo "TZ='Asia/Shanghai'; export TZ" >> ~/.profile
$ . ~/.profile
$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get upgrade

Install Dropbox

$ cd ~ && wget -O - "https://www.dropbox.com/download?plat=lnx.x86_64" | tar xzf -
$ mkdir -p ~/bin && wget -O ~/bin/dropbox.py "https://www.dropbox.com/download?dl=packages/dropbox.py"

Install nginx

From Repositories

$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get upgrade
$ sudo apt-get install nginx

From Source Distribution

$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get upgrade
$ sudo apt-get install libpcre3-dev build-essential libssl-dev
$ cd /opt/
$ sudo wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.5.9.tar.gz
$ sudo tar -zxvf nginx-1.5.9.tar.gz
$ cd /opt/nginx-1.5.9/
$ sudo ./configure --prefix=/opt/nginx --user=nginx --group=nginx --with-http_ssl_module --with-ipv6
You should see:
nginx path prefix: "/opt/nginx"
nginx binary file: "/opt/nginx/sbin/nginx"
nginx configuration prefix: "/opt/nginx/conf"
nginx configuration file: "/opt/nginx/conf/nginx.conf"
nginx pid file: "/opt/nginx/logs/nginx.pid"
nginx error log file: "/opt/nginx/logs/error.log"
nginx http access log file: "/opt/nginx/logs/access.log"
nginx http client request body temporary files: "client_body_temp"
nginx http proxy temporary files: "proxy_temp"
nginx http fastcgi temporary files: "fastcgi_temp"
nginx http uwsgi temporary files: "uwsgi_temp"
nginx http scgi temporary files: "scgi_temp"
Then
$ sudo make
$ sudo make install
$ sudo adduser --system --no-create-home --disabled-login --disabled-password --group nginx

Create an Init Script to Manage Nginx

$ sudo wget -O init-deb.sh http://library.linode.com/assets/1538-init-deb.sh
$ sudo mv init-deb.sh /etc/init.d/nginx
$ sudo chmod +x /etc/init.d/nginx
$ sudo /usr/sbin/update-rc.d -f nginx defaults

Edit /etc/init.d/nginx

DAEMON=/usr/sbin/nginx

Edit /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

user cauchy;

Start nginx

$ sudo service nginx start

Add www folder

$ sudo mkdir /var/www
$ sudo chown cauchy:cauchy /var/www

Add Virtual Host, edit /etc/nginx/conf.d/vhosts.conf

server {
    listen 80;
    server_name cauchy.com;
    index index.html;
    root /var/www/cauchycai.github.io;
}

Install jekyll

install gem

install jekyll

$ sudo gem install jekyll

github config

Install git client

$ sudo apt-get install git
$ git config --global user.email "yourname@example.com"
$ git config --global user.name "Your Name"

Make sure .ssh/id_rsa.pub does not exist

$ cd ~/.ssh
$ ls -al

Generate a new SSH key

$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "yourname@example.com"

Copy .ssh/id_rsa.pub to github and test

$ ssh -T git@github.com

Post.title: Install Ruby on Rails on Debian 7.5
Post._content:
### Installing Passenger and Dependencies

	$ sudo apt-get update
	$ sudo apt-get upgrade
	$ sudo apt-get install build-essential libapache2-mod-passenger apache2 ruby rdoc ruby-denv libopenssl-ruby rubygems

### Using the gem package manager for Ruby modules, install the fastthread gem:

	$ sudo gem install fastthread
	$ sudo gem install rails

### Or install previous versions of rails

	$ gem install rails --version 2.1.2
	$ gem install rails --version 2.2.2
	$ gem install rails --version 2.3.5
	$ gem install rails --version 3.0.4

### Install RVM

	$ curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby
	$ echo "source $HOME/.rvm/scripts/rvm" >> ~/.profile
Post.raw:
---
title: "Install Ruby on Rails on Debian 7.5"
date: 2014-06-15 00:00:00
tags: [om, linux, ruby]
---


### Installing Passenger and Dependencies

	$ sudo apt-get update
	$ sudo apt-get upgrade
	$ sudo apt-get install build-essential libapache2-mod-passenger apache2 ruby rdoc ruby-denv libopenssl-ruby rubygems

### Using the gem package manager for Ruby modules, install the fastthread gem:

	$ sudo gem install fastthread
	$ sudo gem install rails

### Or install previous versions of rails

	$ gem install rails --version 2.1.2
	$ gem install rails --version 2.2.2
	$ gem install rails --version 2.3.5
	$ gem install rails --version 3.0.4

### Install RVM

	$ curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby
	$ echo "source $HOME/.rvm/scripts/rvm" >> ~/.profile
Post.content:
Installing Passenger and Dependencies

$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get upgrade
$ sudo apt-get install build-essential libapache2-mod-passenger apache2 ruby rdoc ruby-denv libopenssl-ruby rubygems

Using the gem package manager for Ruby modules, install the fastthread gem:

$ sudo gem install fastthread
$ sudo gem install rails

Or install previous versions of rails

$ gem install rails --version 2.1.2
$ gem install rails --version 2.2.2
$ gem install rails --version 2.3.5
$ gem install rails --version 3.0.4

Install RVM

$ curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby
$ echo "source $HOME/.rvm/scripts/rvm" >> ~/.profile
Post.more:
Installing Passenger and Dependencies

$ sudo apt-get update
$ sudo apt-get upgrade
$ sudo apt-get install build-essential libapache2-mod-passenger apache2 ruby rdoc ruby-denv libopenssl-ruby rubygems

Using the gem package manager for Ruby modules, install the fastthread gem:

$ sudo gem install fastthread
$ sudo gem install rails

Or install previous versions of rails

$ gem install rails --version 2.1.2
$ gem install rails --version 2.2.2
$ gem install rails --version 2.3.5
$ gem install rails --version 3.0.4

Install RVM

$ curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --ruby
$ echo "source $HOME/.rvm/scripts/rvm" >> ~/.profile

Post.title: PHP Autoloading
Post.content:
Autoloadingphp5

autoloadingphp

__autoload spl_autoload_register

spl_autoload_register

autoload/, autoloadrequire

autoload

psr-4

PHP Framework Interop Group Autoloading

http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-4/

\<NamespaceName>(\<SubNamespaceNames>)*\<ClassName>
  1. namespace, namespace vendor namespace;
  2. sub-namespace;
  4. (_)(psr-0)

includephp

  1. namespacebase
  2. sub-namespacebase
  3. .php

autoloading

require
Post.more:
Autoloadingphp5

autoloadingphp

__autoload spl_autoload_register

spl_autoload_register

autoload/, autoloadrequire

autoload

psr-4

PHP Framework Interop Group Autoloading

http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-4/

\<NamespaceName>(\<SubNamespaceNames>)*\<ClassName>
  1. namespace, namespace vendor namespace;
  2. sub-namespace;
  4. (_)(psr-0)

includephp

  1. namespacebase
  2. sub-namespacebase
  3. .php

autoloading

require

Post.raw:
---
title: "Mac  Emacs "
date: 2015-06-25 00:00:00
tags: [emacs, osx, mac, software]
---


* brew 

{% codeblock bash %}
$ brew install --cocoa emacs
$ brew linkapps emacs
{% endcodeblock %}

* brew

{% codeblock bash %}
$ brew tap railwaycat/emacsmacport
$ brew install emacs-mac
$ brew linkapps emacs-mac
{% endcodeblock %}

* "Emacs for Mac OS X" http://emacsformacosx.com , Pure

* AquaEmacshttp://aquamacs.org

Post.title: Installing Jekyll
Post._content:
1. Install Ruby and gem.

2. $ gem install jekyll

3. $ jekyll new blog

4. Writing a new blog entry and save it to yyyy-mm-dd-blog-entry-name.md.

5. $ jekyll build

6. $ jekyll serve
Post.raw:

title: "Installing Jekyll"
date: 2015-06-25 00:00:00
tags: [jekyll]
---


1. Install Ruby and gem.

2. $ gem install jekyll

3. $ jekyll new blog

4. Writing a new blog entry and save it to yyyy-mm-dd-blog-entry-name.md.

5. $ jekyll build

6. $ jekyll serve
Post.content:
1. Install Ruby and gem.

  2. $ gem install jekyll

  3. $ jekyll new blog

  4. Writing a new blog entry and save it to yyyy-mm-dd-blog-entry-name.md.

  5. $ jekyll build

  6. $ jekyll serve
Post.more:
1. Install Ruby and gem.

  2. $ gem install jekyll

  3. $ jekyll new blog

  4. Writing a new blog entry and save it to yyyy-mm-dd-blog-entry-name.md.

  5. $ jekyll build

  6. $ jekyll serve

Post.title: git-svn
Post.raw:
---
title: "git-svn "
date: 2015-05-25 00:00:00
tags: [git, software]
---


svngit

svngit

gitbranchsvnbranchmerging branch merge  master  master

 git git-svn  svn 



#### 1.  svn  ####

{% codeblock bash %}
$ git svn clone http://svn.repo.url/project
{% endcodeblock %}


#### 2.  git  svn  remote  git-svn  ####

{% codeblock bash %}
$ git branch -a
{% endcodeblock %}

#### 3. O.K.  git  git  remote  svn  ####

{% codeblock bash %}
$ git svn dcommit
{% endcodeblock %}

 git  commit  git-svn  remote  push  svn 


#### 4.  svn up   ####

{% codeblock bash %}
$ git svn rebase
{% endcodeblock %}

O.K. 

 https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/git-svn.html
Post.content:
svngit

svngit

gitbranchsvnbranchmerging branch merge master master

git git-svn svn

1. svn

2. git svn remote git-svn

3. O.K. git git remote svn

git commit git-svn remote push svn

4. svn up

O.K.

https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/git-svn.html

Post.title: dired
Post._content:
Most commands operate on the marked files and use the current file if no files are marked.

Use a numeric prefix argument to operate on the next ARG (or previous -ARG if ARG<0) files, or just `1' to operate on the current file only.

###  ###

\+ => dired-create-directory

Q => dired-do-query-replace-regexp

d => 

m => Mark 

u => Unmark

DEL =>  unmark  unflag

x =>  'D' 

RET => ( dired buffer) ,  window 

o =>  other-window

i =>  dired buffer 

R =>   mark 

C => 

s => Toggle Sorting by name/date. C-u s => Change the 'ls' switches

g => Read (refresh) all currently expanded directories aGain

! => dired-do-shell-command, & => dired-do-async-shell-command

$ => Folding a dir, dired-hide-subdir

. => dired-clean-directory

t => dired-toggle-marks

U => dired-unmark-all-marks

S => dired-do-symlink

T => dired-do-touch

###  ###

M => dired-do-chmod

G => dired-do-chgrp

O => dired-do-chown

Z => dired-do-compress

y => dired-show-file-type

~ => dired-flag-backup-files

M-{ , M-} => Goto Prev/Next Marked File

### %  ###

% l =>  mark 

% u =>  

% m => dired-mark-files-regexp

% r => dired-do-rename-regexp, 

% g =>  Mark 

% C =>  regexp  Mark 

### *  ###

Post.title: My Favourite Emacs Modes - Projectile
Post._content:
### Projectile  ###

Projectile  grep

###  ###

{% codeblock lisp %}
(require-package 'projectile)
(projectile-global-mode)
(setq projectile-enable-caching t)
{% endcodeblock %}

###  ###

 version control  Projectile 

 .projectile  projecctile 

###  command ###

C-c p f => projectile-find-file, 

C-c p p => projectile-switch-project, 

C-c p b => projectile-switch-to-buffer,  buffer  projectile C-x b buffer bufferemacsbufferbuffer C-x b 

C-c p I => projectile-ibuffer, bufferbuffer

C-c p ! => projectile-run-shell-command-in-root, shell

C-c p & => projectile-run-async-shell-command-in-root, shell

C-c p S => projectile-save-project-buffers, buffer

C-c p k => projectile-kill-buffers, buffer

C-c p r => projectile-replace, 

C-c p s g => projectile-grep, grep

C-c p 4 f => projectile-find-file-other-window, window

Post.title: My Favourite Emacs Modes - multiple-cursors
Post._content:
### multiple-cursors  ###

multiple-cursors 

###  ###

{% codeblock lang:lisp %}
(require-package 'multiple-cursors)
{% endcodeblock %}

###  ###

C-> => mc/mark-next-like-this, region 

C-< => mc/mark-next-like-this, 

C-c C-< => mc/mark-all-like-this, buffer

 <return> C-g multiple-cursors C-j,  <return> 

### region ###

C-c c c => mc/edit-lines, regioncursor

C-c c e => mc/edit-ends-of-lines, regioncursor

C-c c a => mc/edit-beginnings-of-lines, regioncursor

###  ###

mc/mark-all-in-region

mc/mark-all-like-this-in-defun

mc/mark-all-symbols-like-this-in-defun

mc/insert-numbers

mc/sort-regions

mc/reverse-regions

Post.title: Git-rebase
Post._content:
Git  - rebase commit Git  commit 

 rebase  Git 

 feature oauth2-login master  master oauth2-login master  oauth2-login  git rebase master  rebase  fix  git add  git rebase --continue  continue  git rebase --skip master  commit 



Git commitscommits Git 

 .git/logs/refs   heads  remotes .git/logs/refs/heads,  remotes  remote branch  .git/logs/refs/heads/ : oauth2-login, 

rebasehead  commit  sha1  rebase  head  commit  sha1 


    $ git checkout -b oauth2-login-recovery foiwjfelajwldfj913s

rebaseheadbase branchbranchcommits

Post.title: OSX  VPN
Post._content:
VPN 

IPVPNVPN

1. /domain/DNS
2. /domain
3. VPN

1 VPNdns

2OSX  10.x.x.x  192.168.x.x  /etc/ip-up  /etc/ip-down :

{% codeblock bash %}
route add xxx.xxx.xxx.0/24 "zzz.zzz.zzz.zzz"
route add yyy.yyy.0.0/16 "zzz.zzz.zzz.zzz"
{% endcodeblock %}



{% codeblock bash %}
route delete xxx.xxx.xxx.0/24 "zzz.zzz.zzz.zzz"
route delete yyy.yyy.0.0/16 "zzz.zzz.zzz.zzz"
{% endcodeblock %}

 zzz.zzz.zzz.zzz


3chnroutes https://code.google.com/p/chnroutes/   https://github.com/alsotang/ppp
